Returns the current element in the {{tt|enumerate_view}}.

Equivalent to: &lt;!--return reference-type(pos_, *current_);--&gt;
{{box|{{c/core|return}}{{tt|{{nbsp}}}}{{rlpi|/#Member types|reference-type}}{{c/core|(}}{{rlpi|/#Data members|pos_}}{{c/core|, *}}{{rlpi|/#Data members|current_}}{{c/core|);}}}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The current element.
